mission.posting: Coel needs help covering something up that could be potentially dangerous for her.

email.subject: Coel - Cover-up
email.body: Glad you're helping me with this, #PLAYERNAME#! So you know how a while back, like a year ago, I suddenly went off and joined some group and ran into a bit of trouble? Yeah, well, that's coming back and biting me in the ass. Part of what happened involved some shenanigans with an airport. I think there are still records of my activity there. I need help getting into the airport systems and deleting all traces of Coel, AKA me! Thanks for the help! -Coel

attachments.note: Help Coel delete traces of her prior activities Navigate your way through the airport's systems Delete all traces of Coel
